Description: Oduwa is a Cryptocurrency Company
Full Description: Oduwa (OWC) is a digital payment ecosystem that is built on the foundation of a hybrid POW/POS algorithm. It uses peer-to-peer technology to settle all its transactions within the network. It is the first indigenous Pure-PoS Cryptocurrency designed to empower people of African descent. Oduwacoin is a revolutionary digital payment ecosystem and the fintech solution to Africa’s financial trouble. Oduwa originated from the ancient Benin kingdom, meaning – The Road Map to wealth: Your money should work for you and not against you. These are symbols of kingdom power through trade. Founder, Bright Enabulele has been in cryptocurrency space for over ten years and understands the solutions that blockchain technology can bring to the underserved communities, especially in the region of Africa and the unbanked communities around the world. Using peer to peer technology to settle all of its transactions within the network, Oduwacoin is a free open source project derived from collaborative blockchain frameworks that overcome some of the pitfalls of Bitcoin. Oduwacoin is the gateway to underserved communities around the world. Oduwacoin provides all OWC users with the possibility to protect their assets against future volatility. At a time where cash is discouraged, empowering the underserved communities throughout the world is more important than ever before. Oduwacoin (OWC) Oduwacoin is digital cash, virtual money that uses peer-to-peer technology to settle all its transactions within the network. Oduwacoin is a free open source project derived from collaborative blockchain technology with the goal of providing a long-term energyefficient script-based cryptocurrency. Token Allocation Coin type: Cryptocurrency POW/PoS Hard Cap: 21,000,000 MAX Supply PRE-MINED: 70% Total Supply MINEABLE 30% Reward Supply - PoS 21,000,000 OWC is the max supply and the emission of the coin was based on the Oduwa platform. The funds distributed through sales was used for various purposes Sales - 85% Funds for development team for further developing, maintenance and ensure that the Oduwacoin platform is compliant and flourishes across the globe. Also for marketing to gain awareness about the platform and gaining more and more users - 10% Promoter Expense and running cost for the Administrators - 3% Bounty Programs - 2%

Description: NFN8 Group is a pioneer in the machine-created digital asset marketplace offering accredited investors a fixed, consistent monthly cash flow
Full Description: NFN8 Group is a pioneer in the machine-created digital asset marketplace. NFN8 employs a unique sale/leaseback transaction to offer accredited investors a fixed, consistent monthly cash flow. The NFN8 process uses dedicated computers to mine cryptocurrency. The digital currency is then hedged by a strategy designed to level out market spikes and dips and then immediately converted to U.S. Dollars. Profits are reinvested into additional company-owned mining machines. This business plan has led to NFN8’s continued meteoric upswing.

Description: Blockchain-Enabled Circular Supply Chain
Full Description: Nexity Network is building a blockchain-enabled, circular, more transparent, and productive world to rethink how everything is designed, created, used, and recycled, from the food we eat to the clothes we wear and how we do business. Nexity is creating the next economy to serve as a bridge for the companies and customers to enable transparently, responsible, and secure product/service flows. Our ecosystem is positioned to solve supply chain complexities, focusing on day-to-day operational activity from environmental damages, visibility gaps to trust between parties, and fragmented data exchange. While incentivizing supportive Kols, Resellers, and Ambassadors, we are naturally amplifying the benefits of a network effect required to enable circular business applications that are forming the nodes of our infrastructure - paving the way for Nexity to become the global standard in any supply chain activity and for all stakeholders from manufacturers, distributors to consumers and recyclers. Manufacturers will no longer have to worry about how the product is performing after is leaving the factory because we are creating a digital twin of their products to capture data along each consumption step of their lifecycle, including real-time lifespan data and performance, environmental impact, stories, and events - everything to protect their brand and to create a never-before-seen connection with their customers and partners. Retailers will no longer worry about old, web-based user experiences and low/no interaction between products and customers. We augment the entire buying process in a reactive, living system experience that virtually connects the customers with the products they love. Customers will no longer have to research if a product is authentic manually, the brand is responsible, or even the processes behind arranging the atoms inside of the things they are looking for because of Nexity’s combo between digital twins and product tracking.
